alert.note: Alert for Collin; Denton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 3:38PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Denton, southwestern Collin and northern Dallas Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 338 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Carrollton, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dallas, Plano, Garland, Irving, Mesquite, Carrollton, Frisco, Richardson, Lewisville, Allen, Rowlett, Wylie, Coppell, The Colony, Farmers Branch, Balch Springs, University Park, Sachse, Addison and Highland Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35E between mile markers 427 and 447. Interstate 20 near mile marker 476. Interstate 30 between mile markers 45 and 59. Interstate 45 between mile markers 282 and 284. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
